descriptionHtml:
==============================================================================================================================================
Please Endorse If You Download
======================================================================================================================================
==============
Description
==============
This is only a small basic mod, but it does add notable differences to the game.

This mod increases the speed at which all arrows fly, making them much more realistic, as I personally found that they flew too slow. 
The speed of the arrows is now 1.5x of the original speed.

I have also increased the amount of arrows that will stick in opponents and yourself, and how long they stay there for. 
The game will now allow a max of 300 arrows to be fired into to all NPC\'s and yourself and stay there.

==============
Extra
==============
I recommend that you do the following, this will make your arrows go directly to where your cross-hairs are aiming, and increase the maximum distance arrows can fly.

1) Find Skyrim.ini (not SkyrimPrefs.ini), which is located in \'My Documents/My Games/Skyrim\' after running Skyrim once.

2) Backup Skyrim.ini before editing.

3) Add to Skyrim.ini or edit the lines if they are already there:

[Combat]
fMagnetismStrafeHeadingMult=0.0
fMagnetismLookingMult=0.0
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7
f3PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.7

4) And if you want the arrows to fly really far, add this to Skyrim.ini as well:

[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=12288.0000

==============
Compatability
==============
This should be compatible with all other mods, if you find it conflicts with another mod, just load this after the conflicting mod.


====================
Alternate Downloads
====================
Steam Workshop download: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10621


====================
My other mods
====================
If you enjoy this mod, then check out my other mod \"Wild Werewolves\"

Skyrim Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9588

Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=10678
author: Game Raider 500
